name: HighsSparseVectorSum
brief:
Accumulator for sparse vector linear combinations

Efficient accumulation of multiple sparse vectors with quad precision.

**Hybrid Storage:**
- values[]: Full-length HighsCDouble array for accumulation
- nonzeroinds[]: Packed indices of nonzero entries
- O(nnz) iteration with O(1) random access

**Key Operations:**
- add(): Accumulate value at index, track new nonzeros
  - Uses DBL_MIN sentinel to distinguish zero from never-set
- getNonzeros(): Return accumulated nonzero indices
- getValue(): Extract accumulated value at index
- clear(): Reset (O(nnz) or O(n) based on density)

**Template Methods:**
- partition(): Partition nonzeros by predicate
- cleanup(): Remove entries satisfying isZero predicate

**Usage:**
Row aggregation for cut generation (HighsLpAggregator uses this)
